actions.name: Spectrum
actions.description:
Trigger: The start of the user's Activation.

Effect: The user's non-Dragon Type changes to one of the Types of the nearest creature within Range. If no creatures are within Range, or the creature lacks a Type, the user's non-Dragon Type changes to Normal.
